# EKVirtualConferenceURLDescriptor

**Class**

Details about how users join a virtual conference, including a title and URL.

## Declaration

```swift
class EKVirtualConferenceURLDescriptor
```

## Overview

To let users join a virtual conference, you provide one or more URL descriptor objects in the [doc://com.apple.eventkit/documentation/EventKit/EKVirtualConferenceDescriptor] for the conference. Calendar uses the first URL descriptor as the preferred way for users to join a virtual conference and displays any additional links you provide in the virtual conference details.

## Creating URL Descriptors

- **init(title:url:)**: Creates a URL descriptor with the given title and URL.

## Configuring URL Descriptors

- **title**: The user-visible name of a room where virtual conferences take place, such as Personal Room or Team Room.
- **url**: The URL that users open to join a virtual conference.

## Configuring Virtual Conferences

- **title**: The user-visible name of the virtual conference.
- **urlDescriptors**: An array that contains objects with details about where to join the virtual conference.
- **conferenceDetails**: Additional information about the conference that users may find helpful.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
